item.title: Cheap Monday or how to be thin, poor and fashionable
item.description: One sometimes feels that a famous saying by the Duchess of Windsor ought to be qualified, or even applied in reverse: nowadays, if you want to be fashionable, you can never be too thin (that bit hasnâ€™t changed), or too poor.
